## Hooks.async() method

Register an async function to filter a value.

Signature:

```typescript
async<T extends keyof Hooks.Map & string>(id: T, callback?: (param?: Hooks.Map[T]) => Promise<Hooks.Map[T]>): Framework;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                                                      | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| id        | T                                                                                                                         |             |
| callback  | (param?: [Hooks.Map](/api/bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]) =&gt; Promise&lt;[Hooks/Map](//bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]&gt; |             |

Returns:

[Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework)

## Example

```js
app.hooks.on("namespace.name.value", (value) => "replaced by this string");
```
